text: Kao Shao-yuan (; born 11 June 1988) is a Taiwanese former professional tennis player. In her career, she won 18 doubles titles on the ITF Women's Circuit. Kao has a career-high WTA singles ranking of 630, achieved on 4 December 2006. She also has a career-high WTA doubles ranking of 213, set on 6 June 2011. In 2014, she played her last match on the pro circuit. ==ITF Finals== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; width:15%;" !Legend |- style="background:#f88379;" | $100,000 tournaments |-
